files.README.md:
# kata-marketplace

Marketplace for Kata - spec-driven development framework for Claude Code.

## Installation

Add this marketplace:
```
/plugin marketplace add gannonh/kata-marketplace
```

## Available Plugins

### Kata

Spec-driven development framework for Claude Code.

```
/plugin install kata@kata-marketplace
```

[Learn more](https://github.com/gannonh/kata)

plugins.name: kata
plugins.description: Spec-driven development framework for Claude Code. Provides structured workflows for requirements gathering, research, planning, execution, and verification.
